Text:
use this instead:
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3930262/The_Triplets_of_Belleville

this torrent has two problems

1) audio tags match the musicbrainz french pseudo-release, for the most part.

pistes02-17 match up perfectly with tracks03-18

piste01 is sort of like track02 {belleville rv french}

piste08 is sort of like track19 {belleville rv english}

track01 {sous le pont} is completely missing.

2) includes bonus pyramid scam
